messages.subject: What Shinsengumi films would YOU like to see subtitled?
messages.msgSnippet: We ve been told that the good folk at Samuraidvd.com are wondering what Japanese language Shinsengumi related films to subtitle and distribute next and they d
messages.messageBody:
We've been told that the good folk at Samuraidvd.com are wondering what
Japanese language Shinsengumi related films to subtitle and distribute
next and they'd like input from us!

To help you decide (and you certainly can nominate any film we may not
already have mentioned) why not pop on over to the SHQ website and check
out our filmography links. Here they are.

http://www.shinsengumihq.com/film.htm

http://www.shinsengumihq.com/byakkotai.htm

Feel free to respond via the list or private email to either myself
bsher213(@... or secretarytocapt3@... and if you
could just put Subtitles or Films in the subject line.



--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
http://www.dragonsdisciple.com
